tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SuggestionBox ( 
    suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    suggestion_text TEXT, 
    upvotes INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeeFeedback(employee_id) 
);
CREATE TABLE Employee( employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, employee_department VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, hire_date DATE NOT NULL, feedback TEXT );
CREATE TABLE FeedbackCategory( category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE Feedback( feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), feedback_date DATE NOT NULL, category_id INT REFERENCES FeedbackCategory(category_id), feedback_text TEXT, rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5) );
CREATE TABLE Suggestions( suggestion_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), suggestion_date DATE NOT NULL, suggestion_text TEXT );
CREATE TABLE ImprovementPlan( plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, plan_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL, description TEXT );
